PackageBase.description: PackageBase Module containing everythink to create a Package.

CONSTANTS.description: Bot Constants used to generalize Outputs and Settings.

fs.description: NodeJS File System interface to the Operating File System.

path.description: Path Module used for manipulating FileSystem Paths.

PackageBase.description: Parent Class of Packages. Providing all neccacary features to create and maintain a Package.

constructor.description: Sets all neccacary Variables, Settings and Logging Functions requiered for a Package.

Init.description: Used for custom Initializations - Default: returns resolved Promise.

PostInit.description: Used for custom PostInitializations - Default: if set, Connects Packages (PackageInterconnect) and returns a resolved Promise.

enable.description: Used for enabling the Package - Default: sets 'Settings.enabled' to 'true' and returns a resolved Promise.

disable.description: Used for disabling the Package - Default: sets 'Settings.enabled' to 'false' and returns a resolved Promise.

reload.description: Used to reload the Packages Settings/Data/... - Default: calls 'Init()' and 'PostInit()' and returns a resolved Promise.

loadSettings.description: Loads the config.json File provided by the Package and checks the content.

CheckSettings.description: Custom Settings Check. Return true on success and false on discrepancy - Default: returns true.

changeSettings.description: Sets requiered Package Variables and enables/disables Features.

setEnable.description: Sets the isEnabled() Functions Return to the given Boolean.

setLogger.description: Sets the ClassÂ´s Logger Functions. The Logger Object needs an info(msg:string), a warn(msg:string) and an error(msg:error) Function.

allowPackageInterconnects.description: Sets the given allowed Object Content to the Allowed_Package_Interconnects Object.

addPackageInterconnectRequest.description: Adds a Packge Interconnect Request to the Requested_Package_Interconnects Object.

requestPackageInterconnect.description: Adds an allowed Package Interconnect, otherwise blocks and returns false.

setPackageInterconnect.description: Adds a Packge Interconnect Callback to the Package_Interconnects Object.

removePackageInterconnect.description: Removes a Packge Interconnect from the Package_Interconnects Object.

useDefaultFileRouter.description: Sets an Express Router to static Files inside the Packages 'html' Folder.

setFileRouter.description: Sets an Express Router to the Package URL Route.

setAPIRouter.description: Sets an Express Router to the Package API-URL Route.

setHTMLNavigation.description: Sets the isNaviEnabled() Content, providing information about Navigation settings on the Website.

getHTMLROOT.description: Returns the URL Root out the File Router.

getAPIROOT.description: Returns the URL Root out the API Router.

getPackageDetails.description: Returns the Package Details including Description and Html Root, if provided.

isEnabled.description: Returns the current enable State of the Package.

isNaviEnabled.description: Returns Information about the Website Navigation Settings. Default: false

writeFile.description: Writes a data String into a File at the given path.

readFile.description: Reads a data String from a File at the given path.

copyFile.description: Copies a given File to the new given Dir.

HTMLFileExists.description: Converts a URL String into a FileSystem Path and Returns that File, if it exist.

AddObjectElementsToOtherObject.description: Adds the Contents of Object B to Object A. A logger can be set to output changes/infos. A replaceMode can be set, to overwrite existing Contents.

HasObjectContents.description: Recursivly Checks Object Contents for existance. Returns a String with a 'discrepancy-message' or True, if all Contents are present.

checkForCompletion.description: Recursivly Checks Object Contents for existance. Returns a String with a 'discrepancy-message' or 'COMPLETE', if all Contents are present.

ReplaceObjectContents.description: Changes the Content of a Key inside an Object. path is a Dot-Seperated List of Key-Names going deeper into the Object.

StringContains.description: Checks a given Sting if it contains any of the given substring in the given array.

arrayShiftUp.description: Shifts the given Array Elements up n(default: 1) places.
